title: How to Delete All Media on WhatsApp: Photos, Videos, Chats

steps.title: Open WhatsApp and tap Settings.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp and tap Settings . You’ll find it in the bottom-right corner of the screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the back button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Storage and data.
steps.content: Tap Storage and data . It's near the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Manage storage.
steps.content: Tap Manage storage . A new page will open.

steps.title: Select a chat.
steps.content: Select a chat. You'll see all open chats listed.

steps.title: Tap Select all.
steps.content: Tap Select all . This will select all media in the chat. If you only want to select certain media, tap and hold an item you want to delete. Then, select more items. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the trash can icon.
steps.content: Tap the trash can icon. If there were starred items in your selection, you can select Delete All Except Starred or Delete All .

steps.title: Tap Delete item(s).
steps.content: Tap Delete item(s) . This will confirm the action. The media will be deleted. Repeat this process for all other chats.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp and tap ⋮.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp and tap ⋮ . You can find this button in the top-right corner of your screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the back button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's at the bottom of the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Storage and data.
steps.content: Tap Storage and data . It's in the middle of the page.

steps.title: Tap Manage storage.
steps.content: Tap Manage storage . You'll find this option at the top of the page. If this option is gone, WhatsApp doesn't have any media that you can delete. If you're encountering storage errors and this option is gone, try deleting and reinstalling WhatsApp .

steps.title: Select a chat.
steps.content: Select a chat. You'll see all open chats listed.

steps.title: Tap Select All.
steps.content: Tap Select All . This will select all media in the chat. If you only want to select certain media, tap and hold an item you want to delete. Then, select more items.

steps.title: Tap the trash can icon.
steps.content: Tap the trash can icon. If there were starred items in your selection, you can select Delete All Except Starred or Delete All .

steps.title: Tap Delete Item(s).
steps.content: Tap Delete Item(s) . This will confirm the action. The media will be deleted. Repeat this process for all other chats.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp and tap Settings.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp and tap Settings . You’ll find it in the bottom-right corner of the screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the back button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Clear all chats.
steps.content: Tap Clear all chats . This is towards the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Enter your phone number when prompted.
steps.content: Enter your phone number when prompted. Tap the "your phone number" text field in the middle of the page, and then enter the phone number that you used to create your WhatsApp account.

steps.title: Tap Clear All Chats.
steps.content: Tap Clear All Chats . All chats will be deleted from your WhatsApp account.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp and tap ⋮.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp and tap ⋮ . You can find this button in the top-right corner of your screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the back button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's at the bottom of the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . You'll find this option near the top of the Settings page.

steps.title: Tap Chat history.
steps.content: Tap Chat history . It's near the bottom of the Chats page.

steps.title: Tap Clear all chats.
steps.content: Tap Clear all chats . This option is near the bottom of the page. If desired, check the boxes for Also delete media received in chats from the device gallery and/or Delete starred messages . If prompted, enter the phone number used to create your WhatsApp account. This is used to verify your account.

steps.title: Tap Clear chats.
steps.content: Tap Clear chats . All chats will be deleted from your WhatsApp account. However, you can recover it with a back up if one was made before the deletion.
